editorialNotes.tagline: Team up to solve the puzzles

editorialNotes.standard: After a long day at work, it’s bath time! But Swampy’s shower is broken and he needs your help to guide the water to him. Navigate a path through the dirt past contraptions and obstacles to get every drop to fill the bath.

name: Tick Tock: A Tale for Two

editorialNotes.standard: Mesmerising from start to finish, Monument Valley offers a world of uncanny beauty and constant wonder. To help a princess proceed on her mysterious quest, you’ll face ingenious puzzles that involve lifting and spinning the environment in seemingly impossible ways. It’s a mind-bending journey filled with the joy of discovery, making Ustwo’s adventure a must-play for gamers of every experience level.
editorialNotes.short: Traverse mind-bending levels that are structurally impossible

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

ios.subtitle: The moving story of a lifetime

editorialNotes.standard: Moving’s a drag! Relocate to this satisfying puzzler in which you unpack boxes filled with all sorts of goodies.

editorialNotes.short: Unravel family secrets on a remote island cursed by plagues in this dark puzzle adventure.

editorialNotes.standard: The enchantingly eccentric Rusty Lake series heads underground! Solve strange puzzles in train stations representing different eras of a woman’s life.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.short: Brilliant puzzle designs and a haunting atmosphere make this unforgettable
editorialNotes.standard: Now here’s how you build a sequel! With The Room Three, Fireproof Games kept everything we love about this series—its chilling atmosphere, mind-bending puzzles and beautiful visuals—while making masterful enhancements. The story continues with trials set by a creepy new nemesis, The Craftsman. As you explore huge areas and tiny ones, the challenges feel increasingly epic, and a better-than-ever hint system ensures that finding solutions is super-rewarding.

You might get stuck the first time you play Gorogoa. But once the gears of your brain settle into the right configurations, you’ll see how smart this mix of art and perspective really is. Layers pile upon layers, doors transport you between realities, strange creatures and wild environments blend together into a fascinating interactive collage you’ll want to peel apart to discover what lies underneath.

editorialNotes.tagline: Jump in and save the ninjas!

ios.subtitle: Roll the ball from cat to cat

Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: We’ll never forget ascending a mysterious tower with the help of a pet-like friend in this wordless point-and-click adventure about cooperation and personal purpose.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References
Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References
Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: Put a little “boo” in your botany by concocting herbal remedies for odd supernatural ailments in this eerie puzzle-adventure.

We’ve played plenty of grid-based puzzlers, but there’s just something about Link Twin that feels right. It might be the gorgeous, minimal art direction. Or maybe it's the wonderfully subtle animation or the excellent use of Force Touch. Whatever it is, we can’t stop swiping our way through the bite-sized challenges. Helping a duo reach different destinations is tough—but totally rewarding.
Enigmatic settings and storytelling enrich the mysteries of Leonardo da Vinci’s gadgetry in this escape room puzzle series’ fantastic conclusion.

Limbo is a gripping blend of stark, haunting landscapes, bizarre characters and unsettling sounds. With clever puzzle design, an intriguing narrative and an excellent touch-screen control system, it’s as rewarding to play as it is interesting to look at and listen to.
editorialNotes.short: Dark, haunting, beautiful. This'll stay with you long after it's over.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: A fascinating reinvention of a longtime videogame franchise, Hitman GO takes familiar elements of stealth and assassination and reinterprets them as a wondrously stylised, turn-based boardgame. Each mission presents characters and scenes—some from previous Hitman games—as a sleek diorama, blending old and new to create an innovative experience. Even with helpful distractions and places to hide, inching toward your targets a step at a time demands keen strategy, and trying to pull off optional mission objectives quickly becomes an irresistible obsession.

editorialNotes.short: Geneva Hodgson: Story editor, Donut County
editorialNotes.tagline: How deep does this hole go?

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References
Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.tagline: It might be time to use your fireplace.

editorialNotes.standard: Search for a missing dog through lavishly illustrated cityscapes in this relaxing adventure game.

When dinosaurs collide with LEGO bricks, you don’t have to be Mr. DNA to know the result is pure fun. Starring characters and creatures from all four Jurassic Park movies, this fantastic adventure lets you relive your favorite moments from the series and even create new ones with your own custom dinos. Full of all the humor, action, and surprises you expect, it’s a wacky team-up of T-Rex proportions.

editorialNotes.short: Discover a memorable story full of humour and charming characters.
editorialNotes.tagline: Discover a memorable story full of humour

editorialNotes.standard: Part platformer, part puzzler, Edge has infatuated gamers almost since the opening of the App Store. Guide a nimble cube around the narrow ledges and ever-shifting corridors of a treacherous 3D world, unlocking secrets and collecting items without falling into space. Stylishly minimalist visuals and a slick electronic soundtrack make Edge’s mix of path-finding challenges and pitfall-avoiding thrills easy to get lost in. Its dozens of levels of perfectly balanced gameplay redefine how much fun simplicity and sophistication can be.

FEZ begins with a simple idea: you can rotate the world. The more you play, the more you understand this concept’s far-reaching implications as you jump between ledges and rotate perspective to get pieces of the world to align. The complexity and sophistication of the puzzles keeps growing, building on ideas and forcing you to think in new ways. FEZ is perfect for anyone who loves scouring every little corner of virtual spaces for hidden secrets.

editorialNotes.standard: Help a curious monster explore an archipelago by building bridges in this charming, challenging puzzler.
